results.title: Update on treatment of essential tremor.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@Propranolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Primidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011324 @@@primidone@@@ are considered "effective" agents that treat @<m>DISEASE_Hepatitis_E</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016751 @@@ET@@@; @CHEMICAL_Topiramate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077236 @@@topiramate@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Alprazolam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000525 @@@alprazolam@@@ are "probably effective", and @CHEMICAL_Nimodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009553 @@@nimodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nadolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009248 @@@nadolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Clonazepam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002998 @@@clonazepam@@@ are "possibly effective".

citations.NLM: Zesiewicz TA, Shaw JD, Allison KG, Staffetti JS, Okun MS, Sullivan KL. Update on treatment of essential tremor. Curr Treat Options Neurol. 2013 Aug;15(4):410-23. PMID: 23881742
citations.BibTeX: @article{23881742, title={Update on treatment of essential tremor.}, author={Zesiewicz TA and Shaw JD and Allison KG and Staffetti JS and Okun MS and Sullivan KL}, journal={Curr Treat Options Neurol}, volume={15}, number={4}, pages={410-23}}
